text: Clément Fayat (born 1931/32) is a French billionaire entrepreneur, who founded Fayat Group at the age of 25. Fayat is the son of a bricklayer, and left school at 15 to become a construction apprentice. He founded the civil engineering company Fayat Group when he was 25, and it is now France's largest privately-held construction and civil engineering company, with 19,000 staff in 120 countries. Fayat is married and lives in Saint-Émilion, France. ==Références== Category:1930s births Category:Living people Category:French billionaires Category:French businesspeople
title: Clément Fayat
